long_description: The modified aviator silhoutte of the men's Smith Townsend Polarized Sunglasses harkens to the days of freewheeling road trips and offers coverage to the max. Carbonic TLT lenses are incredibly impact-resistant and optically correct, and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB rays. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frames have polarized gray-green lenses; Tortoise frames have polarized brown lenses. Townsend polarized lenses block 85% of visible light. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Auto-lock hinges. Smith Townsend Polarized Sunglasses fit medium profiles and offer large-area coverage.
short_description: The modified aviator silhoutte of the men's Smith Townsend Polarized Sunglasses harkens to the days of freewheeling road trips and offers coverage to the max.
